Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock: 'We've had some tricky wickets coming up to this game, and it's just nice to spend some time out in the middle'
Aaron Jones: 'It's hard to take the defeat after getting so close. We could have been a little more disciplined bowling-wise. It could have been a closer game and we could have got over the line.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua
Others: The United States had won the toss and opted to field first
Harmeet Singh dismissed De Kock when he mistimed a full toss and was caught near the boundary
Ali Khan took a sharp diving catch to give Saurabh Netravalkar his second wicket
Despite Netravalkar's superb spell (2-21), the others failed to contain South Africa as Heinrich Klaasen dealt in sixes and scored a quick-fire 36
